StratmasClient.substrate
Class SubstrateMapDrawer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  StratmasClient.map.BasicMapDrawer
                      StratmasClient.substrate.SubstrateMapDrawer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, EventListener, Accessible, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener, MapDrawableAdapterListener
public class SubstrateMapDrawer
extends BasicMapDrawer

This class is used to display shapes for regions and population centers as well as to create new shapes. Further on, all the shapes can be initialized by filling a shape with a color which represents a certain value. The colors are chosen by using ColorChooser.

See Also:
Serialized Form

mapDrawableAdaptersUnderCursor

public Vector mapDrawableAdaptersUnderCursor()
Returns a vector with all MapDrawableAdapters presently _drawn_ under the cursor. NB the objects has to be rendered to be returned by this function.

Returns:
MapDrawables currently under the cursor on the map.
